  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Aware, BeanClassLoaderAware, BeanFactoryAware, DisposableBean, FactoryBean<FileTailingMessageProducerSupport>, InitializingBean, Lifecycle, Phased, SmartLifecycle

    public class TailAdapterSpec
extends MessageProducerSpec<TailAdapterSpec,FileTailingMessageProducerSupport>
    A MessageProducerSpec for file tailing adapters.

    5.0
